page.title: 17CHURCH STRETTON LIBRARY
page.content: The library building was built in {1861.}The materials used to build it were stone and brick. Before the building was a library it was a school for all aged children. Quite a few years later a new primary and comprehensive school was built so there was an empty building which became the library. It opened in{1968.}It serves most areas around Stretton and opens on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays and Saturday. The library is up to date with a microfisch which tells you what books are available. The most popular books seem to be historical ones. It also lends records. There is an{information centre}in the library building. This gives information on the area such as interesting places to visit.
